# Copilot Instructions for bai-helper

This file provides guidance for GitHub Copilot when working with this repository.

## Project Overview

This is the bai-helper project. When working on this codebase, follow the conventions and patterns established in the existing code.

## General Guidelines

- Write clean, readable, and maintainable code
- Follow existing code style and conventions in the repository
- Include appropriate error handling
- Add comments only when necessary to explain complex logic
- Keep changes minimal and focused on the task at hand

## Making Changes

- Make small, incremental changes
- Test changes thoroughly before committing
- Ensure changes don't break existing functionality
- Update documentation when adding new features or changing behavior

## Code Review

- Review your changes carefully before submitting
- Ensure code follows project conventions
- Verify all tests pass (if applicable)
